mapper.select: select a.user_id userId,b.user_name userName from user_role_info_relation as a, user_info as b where a.role_id = 3 and a.user_id = b.user_id
select a.user_id userId,b.user_name userName from user_role_info_relation as a, user_info as b where a.role_id = 2 and a.user_id = b.user_id

select a.user_id userId,a.user_name userName,f.role_id userRoleId,f.role_name userRoleName from user_info as a left join ( select c.role_id role_id, d.role_name role_name, c.user_id user_id from user_role_info_relation as c left join user_role as d on c.role_id = d.role_id ) as f on a.user_id = f.user_id
